oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Anaerobic digestion - it’s a gas
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Smith, L.G.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Air and water emissions
Farm nutrient management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The article in the Soil Association's Organic Farming magazine introduces the subject of anaerobic digestion, exploring some of the benefits and of installing this technology on farms and some of the difficulties encountered. Potential sources of funding and further information (eg: relevant ebsites) are also listed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Smith, L.G. (2009) Anaerobic digestion - it’s a gas. Organic Farming, April 2009, pp. 29-31.
